Announcing the “Guru Spotlight Series” + More!

Corinne Meier
4 weeks ago
ShareTweetSign Up

You know how they say good things come in three’s!? Well – we think it’s true. Good energy attracts good energy!

  1. Guru Transfer  was asked to speak at Startup Saturday on “Building A Wow Product.” hosted at Collab CoWork in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Startup Saturdays is a monthly meetup designed by Headstart, that supports entrepreneurship and startups to help early stage Entrepreneurs with their startups. Headstart is India’s largest grass root level organization.

2. We were also contacted to be the official storage vendor for Kinderenergy. Kindernergy, is an environmental 501c3 based in CA who will be participating at the Ocean Conference being held at the UN Headquarters in New York City.

It’s crazy to think that everyone, everywhere has file storage needs!

Do you know the amount of data that is transferred before, during and after international meetings on sustainable development?  Guru Transfer clients know that we value safety, efficiency, and speed when transferring data. With that, we also know that global development is impossible without the cooperation of private sector institutions like us to help!

Kinderenergy is a small yet vibrant company working tirelessly to help secure a tomorrow for some of the world’s poorest children. It’s great for them to consider us as a sponsor!

Alas, it’s not only these amazing opportunities that have come into our path!

3. We are excited to announce that we are working on a virtual resource center for entrepreneurs. India is the next up and coming market of the world, we want to do our part to helping others rise. To launch this, we are commencing the “Guru Spotlight Series” that you can follow on Instagram…

Get to know TOP business growth experts that you NEED to know! Read fun interviews with insightful leaders nominated as proven coaches in helping others rise in business! You TOO can nominate an expert for us to highlight by letting us know here.

Stay tuned for our first featured expert tomorrow and more exciting news from Guru Transfer!
